mapper.select: select e.name AS author, DN.CONTENT, d.department_name, DN.DEPTNOTICE_ID, DN.NOTICE_DATE, DN.TITLE, DN.VIEW_COUNT from department_notice DN JOIN department d ON d.department_id = dn.department_id JOIN employee e ON e.EMP_ID = dn.author where DN.IMPORTANCE = 'Y' and 1 = 1 and dn.department_id = #{departmentId}

SELECT dn.deptnotice_id, d.department_name, dn.title, e.name AS author, dn.view_count, dn.notice_date FROM department_notice dn JOIN department d ON d.department_id = dn.department_id JOIN employee e ON e.EMP_ID = dn.author
where 1 = 1 and dn.department_id = #{departmentId} and dn.importance = 'N'

select DN.DEPTNOTICE_ID, DN.DEPARTMENT_ID, D.DEPARTMENT_NAME, DN.TITLE, DN.IMPORTANCE, E.NAME as AUTHOR, DN.VIEW_COUNT, DN.NOTICE_DATE, DN.CONTENT, DN.DEPT_FILE, FD.DETAIL_ID, FD.FILE_ID, FD.FILE_NAME, FD.FILE_SAVENAME, FD.FILE_PATH, FD.FILE_STATUS, FD.FILE_SIZE, FD.FILE_TYPE, FD.UPLOAD_DATE from department_notice DN join DEPARTMENT D on D.DEPARTMENT_ID = DN.DEPARTMENT_ID JOIN employee e ON e.EMP_ID = dn.author left outer join FILE_DETAIL FD ON DN.DEPT_FILE = FD.FILE_ID where DN.DEPTNOTICE_ID = #{deptnoticeId}
